title: Why was I prema ban...
body:
WHAT FOR? Simple as this....
No information about it.. NOTHJING!!!

WTF is going on? I ask for a email change as I no longer have access to it. THEN BANG.. Prema ban?

COME ON!! Tell my why I was perma ban? Fair is fair. You perma ban me for email change?

replies.body:
They obviously didn't ban you for an email change. The top two reasons they would be giving you a perm ban is either you continued to be toxic. Judging by the way you speak in your post I'm guessing that's the reason.

OR...

You've used third party program. Can you perhaps give more details as to what you've done in the past 3 days, weeks or months on LoL?

Okay. So you are allow to be passive toxic.. Just to make a point about being toxic.. ironic... { See what i did there? }

No I did not use hacks /3rd party crap on this account. EVER.
As for the " Toxic "

No. I wasn't, I would mute everyone in a game soon as I went in. But if you are trying to say with your passive toxic thatI am pissed off right now.
I AM.. Yes.

SUCK A FINGER!  lol!

ENJOY UR BAN! 

GO PLAY DOTA 2 toxic troll/cheater!

They send out an email with the reasons you were banned. Check your recent email and the one you changed from (check spams folders as the emails sometimes end up there). 

If you haven't received an email, [please send in a support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and they will be able to tell you about your ban. Riot can't discuss account specific stuff on the boards.

They have discussed it here before, the player asked for it, literally, and got what was coming, the full report posted on the forums. It is quite amusing when they rant and rave, but Riot will have the evidence. And this has happened more than once also.

I dont have access to that email anymore... Over 1 week ago they were informed this and I am still trying to get it changed.
So at this point I HAVE NO IDEA WHY.
I sent a ticket in to ask... But yet nothing.

So I am making a post on the forums to ask why also.
Because you are a... wait for it... Premadona... OK, I'll let myself out now.
